text: (ai rasool) tum kah do ki jab mere paas mere paravaradigaar kee baaragaah se khule hue maujize aa chuke to mujhe is baat kee manaahee kar dee gayee hai ki khuda ko chhod kar jinako tum poojate ho main unakee parasatish karoon aur mujhe to yah hukm ho chuka hai ki main saare jahaann ke paalane vaale ka pharamaabaradaar banu
